cause.description:
Roachia's population has been steadily declining. Please help us by joining!
Roachia is a free comedic online roleplaying game. It does not discriminate against players and encourages everyone to join. Your immagination is your only limit in this game. Literally.
http://roachyrpg.proboards50.com/
Add the Roachia facebook application!
http://www.facebook.com/apps/application.php?api_key=e870155aef3c57406f350a963b286ece
1. Raise Awareness of Roachia
2. Bring in New Members
3. Create a United Roachian Society
cause.mission: raise awareness of the situation in Roachia and to help its population increase.
cause.name: Roachia Awareness Advocacy
